job_tasks.phrase: work closely with stakeholders in understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements for research and development.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the task of understanding business needs and translating them into technical requirements, which aligns with the definition of Business Understanding & Strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Your core role will be to research, prototype and develop data driven software.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the fundamental software engineering task of developing software, including research and prototyping, which falls under Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: As an AI engineer your responsibilities will include building AI driven solutions with both external and internal models.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions building AI-driven solutions using models, which is a core task in Model Development & Fine-Tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Pushing the boundaries of what is possible in the rapidly moving AI ecosystem.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a focus on advancing AI capabilities, which is related to research and development in model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, Design, Prototype, Experiment, and build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of building software components (services, tools, systems, features) which is a key aspect of Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, prototype and build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to building AI/ML systems, which aligns with Model Development & Fine-Tuning.
Mentioning Vector databases and LLMs points towards the use of technologies central to modern AI, often involving RAG and prompt engineering, fitting this category.

job_tasks.phrase: Be the spear point of innovation coming up with smart ideas and solutions and rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes innovation, idea generation, and rapid prototyping of solutions, which are integral to the research and development aspect of Model Development & Fine-Tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with other engineers across the company to continuously consider how to implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of prototypes into large-scale applications, a core task in Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: You work in the R&D department, but you will work together with other teams on a regular basis.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the need to work together with other teams, indicating collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: work together with other teams on a regular basis.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need for collaboration with other teams.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes a balanced mix of tasks. It includes understanding business needs and translating them into technical requirements (1.C.1), researching, prototyping, and developing software (1.A.1), and specifically building AI/ML driven solutions using LLMs and Vector Databases (1.B.1, 1.B.2). The emphasis on innovation, prototyping, and integrating into large-scale applications, alongside the mention of LLMs and Vector Databases, points towards a role that is deeply involved in both software engineering practices and the specific domain of Generative AI, fitting the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to both software development and AI/ML tasks, including specific mentions of LLMs and Vector Databases. The profile assignment is well-supported by the text. However, the ad could be slightly more explicit about the day-to-day tasks involved in model development or fine-tuning to reach a perfect score.
